attributes.review: Now this app as soon as i opened it, appeared to a black screen, nothing appeared and so i restarted my phone and suddenly it glitched my whole phone and i had to go the apple store, but then i forgot it closed! so now i don’t know what to do, it just glitches oudhdnososue@9292&$:739&8292 m@“””@/&😆😁kkowoowiehbxnoo
attributes.title: Was expecting more from this app

attributes.review: Within ten minutes of downloading this app many terrible things have happened to me. First, my goldfish died from drowning. Also, a piano fell straight from the clouds onto my grandma Teresa. Then, my brother drove his car through the window. I’m positive the app is the cause of these disasters. I’m warning you. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP.
attributes.title: this app is cursed

attributes.review: This app was terrible. Everything was slow to work and honestly I’m not sure what I was expecting but it definitely wasn’t this. I tried calling customer support but they were TOTALLY unhelpful. Do we really expect to win this election when THIS is the app. I do not recommend this to anyone.
attributes.title: Awful

attributes.review: I used to live laugh love Trump! After I downloaded this app however, I lost all respect. 🤢🤮 As soon as I get on, I see his face, why would he do that to us ?! 😟 I would not recommend this app unless you want your family and friends to mysteriously disappear and then you’ll have no one 😨😖 If I could, I would vote obama🤩
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP

attributes.review: After hours of debating whether or not I should get the app I caved and got it. It’s not even worth it for free. I opened it up and immediately my whole house smelled like poo. I thought my dog just farted but no everywhere I go I smell like poo now. I get bullied by all my friends now for the way I smell. Donald J. Trump is responsible for me getting bullied.
attributes.title: smells like poo

attributes.review: This app made my phone crash!! I got it in support of our wonderful president whom I love and support, but after I downloaded the app it BROKE MY PHONE! I don’t know what kind of sick joke Mr. Trump is trying to pull but this app cost me an extra 200 dollars, and a trip outside which I HATE GOING OUT BECAUSE OF COVID!! If I get covid because of this app as well I’m blaming you TRUMP!! Horrible. DONT GET THIS APP!!
attributes.title: HORRIBLE!

attributes.review:
Download the app for all current info straight from the Trump 2020 Campaign. No
Fake news filter here!!
attributes.title: Don’t believe the haters

attributes.review: Obviously all those bad reviews are from Trump haters. The app is fine. Nothing wrong with it that I can see. Trump 2020!
attributes.title: Bad Reviews from Trump Haters

attributes.review: I don’t even know why it exist. It’s boring. It doesn’t even Stan The Rose or Got7. So what’s the point of it even existing? That’s right, there is none, there is no point of such a hideous thing existing. But all I got to say Stan Loona, Stan TXT, Stan The Rose, Stan Blackpink, Stan Astro, Stan Ateez,  Stan Red Velvet, Stan G-idle, Stan BTS, Stan NCT, Stan Exo mostly Baby daddy Chen, Stan Dpr live, Stan Zico, Overall just Stan Korean music. And remember its always a great day to watch anime.
attributes.title: IT DOESN’T EVEN STAN LOONA!!!
